Question: Can you provide more information about Lululemon's sustainable practices?
Generative Answer: Lululemon is committed to accelerating their progress and being part of the solution. They adopt better fibres, evolve manufacturing processes, innovate net new materials, and engage industry collaborations to help evolve collective solutions. You can learn more about their sustainability initiatives here: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/be-planet and their product sustainability here: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/product-sustainability. Additionally, they have launched the lululemon Centre for Social Impact to disrupt inequity in wellbeing through movement, mindfulness, and advocacy. You can learn more about this here: https://shop.lululemon.com/story/sustainability.

Question: does lululemon support gender rights
Generative Answer: At lululemon, we stand for gender pay equity: equal pay for equal work. In April 2018 we achieved gender pay equity as a global organization and committed to regularly assessing our hiring and reward practices to ensure we are making informed and inclusive decisions that reflect our values. For more information, please visit https://shop.lululemon.com/story/sustainability.
